name: Catapult
description:
Choose one object up to 100kg within range that isn't being worn or carried by another creature. The object can be catapulted, making a spell attack, according to the ranged section of the Improvised Weapons table, and 1d8 extra damage is dealt. Strength requirements are ignored.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8, for each slot level above 1st.
